definitions.definition: A sweet cake or biscuit (crumbly leavened bread) typically made with flour , sugar , salt , butter , milk or cream , and sometimes eggs , and leavened with baking powder or baking soda .
A dessert made with such a cake, typically having layers of cream and fruit.

main_definition: A sweet cake or biscuit (crumbly leavened bread) typically made with flour , sugar , salt , butter , milk or cream , and sometimes eggs , and leavened with baking powder or baking soda .
secondary_definitions: A dessert made with such a cake, typically having layers of cream and fruit.
